original_title: Violent Femmes: La Edad de Oro - Live in Madrid
overview: Title: VIOLENT FEMMES, La Edad de Oro April 2 1985 - Madrid TVE2, Rebroadcast December 30 2006 TVE 50 Years, ProShot PAL DVD, 98 minutes. AMAZING SHOW, Complete, Inedit and digitally recorded.  Violent Femmes 04/02/85  TVE Studio #1, Prado del Rey, Madrid, Spain  PAL format. show : 87 min. + interview : 11 min. Menus & song selection.  This is the last one of the classic recordings from TVE 50  PRO SHOT > DVB-T Digital Recording > DVD Studio Pro  ________  Blister in The Sun  Promise  Country Death Song  Prove My Love  Never Tell  Old Mother Reagan  Gimme The Car  Add It Up  Kiss Off  Hallowed Ground  I Hear The Rain  Jesus Walking On The Water  Gone Daddy Gone  Confessions  Old Mother Reagan (Second take)  To the Kill  Ugly  Faith  Black Girls
title: Violent Femmes: La Edad de Oro - Live in Madrid
